Flow.description: SMS messages for TSA appointment invitations (updated wording and URL)

value.stringValue: "Now that your business is set up, we need to discuss upcoming tax deadlines coming soon. Please schedule a convenient time: http://taxplanpro.com/t/?w="+[Account].Primary_Contact__c.Id+"&c=SMS Reply STOP to stop receiving messages."

formulas.name: formula_2_myRule_1_A1_0494451894
formulas.expression: "Now that your business is set up, we need to discuss upcoming tax deadlines coming soon. Please schedule a convenient time: http://taxplanpro.com/t/?w="+{!myVariable_current.Primary_Contact__r.Id}+"&c=SMS Reply STOP to stop receiving messages."

value.stringValue: "We apologize for the inconvenience. 1-800Accountant is currently experiencing an internet outage. We will be unable to call you for your appointment. Please reschedule here at a time that works best for you: http://1800accountant.com/t/?w="+[Account].Primary_Contact__c.Id+"&c=SMS-TSA Reply STOP to stop receiving messages."

formulas.name: formula_7_myRule_6_A1_0036300143
formulas.expression: "We apologize for the inconvenience. 1-800Accountant is currently experiencing an internet outage. We will be unable to call you for your appointment. Please reschedule here at a time that works best for you: http://1800accountant.com/t/?w="+{!myVariable_current.Primary_Contact__r.Id}+"&c=SMS-TSA Reply STOP to stop receiving messages."

Flow.label: Appt Invitation SMS Flow - TSA - (Accounts)
